welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Desert Hot Springs, where the sun always shines and relaxation is just around the corner. Discover our charming city known for its natural hot springs, and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport serves primarily domestic flights, with a few international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Banning Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bermuda Dunes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.
